ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: You probably need to take it if you are in sociology.
The course introduces students to basic statistic methods and assumptions, and I would recommend it to students interested in quantitative methods in sociology.
It's a required course for first year Sociology graduate students and teaches the building blocks of quantitative methodology.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: While I am not yet sure whether or not the course will directly contribute to my thesis, the basic understanding of statistics it provided will be likely to help me to read and evaluate quantitative articles.
I need this course in order to do quantitative Sociological resesarch. It's invaluable training.
